response.explain: The previous action code failed because the robot was not within four meters of the plate. This means that the robot needs to move closer to the plate before it can put the french toast on it.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the oven.
(2) Open the oven.
(3) Take the french toast out of the oven.
(4) Move the robot to the breakfast table.
(5) Put the french toast on the plate.
